sentences.en: ...the one-hour westward flight over the Andes to Lima.
sentences.cn: …越过安第斯山脉到利马一小时的向西飞行。

sentences.en: Economists warn that enormous pressures could build up, forcing people to emigrate westwards.
sentences.cn: 经济学家警告，迫使人们向西部迁移的压力可能会增至很大的程度。
他把他的统治向西推进.

sentences.en: He sailed westward from Palos de la Frontera.
sentences.cn: 他从帕洛斯·德拉·弗龙特拉港出发向西航行。

sentences.en: It expanded New Zealand's South Island by as much as 30 centimetres westwards.
sentences.cn: 它使新西兰南部岛屿向西扩展了大约30厘米.

sentences.en: Kite Flying August, September and October are the months of kites, because the wind blows north - westwards.
sentences.cn: 放鹞子八月 、 玄月、十月是放鹞子的季节, 由于这时的风是朝西北方向刮.

sentences.en: Part of API manufactures start to transfer westwards due to environmental protection and costs domestically.
sentences.cn: 国内由于环保和成本等因素,部分原料药生产企业开始向西部转移.

sentences.en: They turned westward / westwards after crossing the river.
sentences.cn: 他们过河以后向西拐了.

sentences.en: We reached Hastings at about eleven o'clock, and strolled westwards towards Bexhill.
sentences.cn: 我们抵达哈市哈丁时为十一点左右, 于是漫步向西,前去白克希尔.

sentences.en: We travelled westwards for several days.

trans.tran_en: Westward or westwards means toward the west
